testcase.name: Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should accept environment variables and use them
Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should read from STDERR
Command With Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should honour
Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should read from STDOUT
Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should return exit status of the command
Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should run without error if no args provided
Command Without Timeout With Invalid Input Parameters Should not create command object
Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should not timeout if timeout is 0 seconds
Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should run without error if path exists
Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should read from STDOUT and STDERR
Command Without Timeout With Valid Input Parameters Should fail with error if path doesn't exist
